Key Match Events: Jimmy Butler left the game with a right ankle sprain
Tyler Herro led the team with 24 points, 7 rebounds, and 11 assists
Post-Match Reflections: Erik Spoelstra expressed the unknown about Jimmy Butler's injury
Spoelstra said they will look for further updates and have a better idea after the next day
Nikola Jovic expressed frustration about being benched in the second half
Jovic said he hopes to be back in the lineup soon
Tyler Herro said he wants to win at this point
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Heat are now 3-5 and on a three-game losing streak
They face the Minnesota Timberwolves on Sunday night
Jaime Jaquez Jr. is expected to return soon after missing the last three games with a stomach illness
Pelle Larsson played meaningful minutes in place of the injured Jimmy Butler
Others: Heat's roster experiences changes after injury to Jimmy Butler
Butler's status is a concern for the team
The Heat are looking for further updates on Butler's injury
